meanings.sent1: The spaceship traveled through the interplanetary space between Mars and Jupiter.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the interplanetary medium to learn more about our solar system.
meanings.sent3: The aliens had an interplanetary picnic on their journey through the galaxy.
meanings.sent4: The interplanetary highway of asteroids was like a busy cosmic freeway.
meanings.sent5: The interplanetary distances in our universe are mind-bogglingly vast.

meanings.definition: Relating to or involving planets within a solar system.
meanings.sent1: The interplanetary missions explored the different planets in our solar system.
meanings.sent2: Astronomers use telescopes to observe interplanetary phenomena within our solar system.
meanings.sent3: The interplanetary weather forecast predicted a sunny day on Mars.
meanings.sent4: The interplanetary dance of the planets around the sun is a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The interplanetary gravitational pull keeps our solar system in balance.
